TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects. You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
The ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class.
[!code-cs[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.configuration.c_12_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.configuration.c_12_1.vb)]
The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the previous example.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <configuration> <configSections> <section name="CustomSection" type="Samples.AspNet.Configuration.CustomSection, ConfigurationSectionCollection, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" allowDefinition="Everywhere" allowExeDefinition="MachineToApplication" restartOnExternalChanges="true" /> /configSections>
<CustomSection fileName="default.txt" maxUsers="1000" maxIdleTime="00:05:00" />
</configuration> ```
